name: material-utilities
description: A set of CSS classes & custom properties for Material shadows and opacities
author: Maxime Le Conte des Floris

scripts.start: postcss --use postcss-import --use postcss-custom-properties --use autoprefixer -o dist/material-utilities.css src/material-utilities.css && postcss --use postcss-import --use postcss-custom-properties --use autoprefixer --use cssnano -o dist/material-utilities.min.css src/material-utilities.css
